question: 衝撃
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>collide</kanji> and <kanji>attack</kanji> what you're colliding into, you're going to not only cause a large <vocabulary>shock</vocabulary> but also <vocabulary>crash</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>impact</vocabulary> into them. Blamo!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
